server

Class TrafficServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.TrafficServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class TrafficServer
extends Thread
    The TrafficServer is the main server.Tt contains and handle the main server logic. Created by Baljit Singh Sarai on 01.02.16.
    Author:
    Baljit Singh Sarai

      • serverForever

        public void serverForever()
        Loops through all the clients. If it finds any data on anyone of them it creates a task and gives it to a ServiceQueue type. If it finds a broken socket, its deletes it form the list. IMPORTANT! This This method assumes the a char is one byte. This might not always be true everywhere. The portability of this method is not a guarantee.

      • messageRequest

        public String messageRequest(String msg,
                             Client client,
                             Double[] times)
        Handles any incoming data from the Client.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message that is requested.
        client - The Client to whome this message is intended.
        times - The current times on the server wigets.
        Returns:
        A user-friendly message as to what happened.
